import { useContext, useState } from "react" import { Form, Button } from "react-bootstrap" import authService from './../../services/auth.services' const LoginForm = () => { const [loginData, setLoginData] = useState({ email: '', password: '' }) const handleInputChange = e => { const { value, name } = e.target setLoginData({ ...loginData, [name]: value }) } const handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() authService .login(loginData) .then(({ data }) => { storeToken(data.authToken) authenticateUser() navigate('/') }) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } const { password, email } = loginData return (
Email Contrase√±a
) } export default LoginForm
